(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Until 
          (Do 
            (Statement 
              (Arg 
                (Primary 
                  (Lhs 
                    (Variable 
                      (Identifier "bar"))))))) 
          (Arg 
            (Primary 
              (Lhs 
                (Variable 
                  (Identifier "foo"))))))))))
